perception: The road has two lanes in the ego vehicle's direction, separated by a double yellow line from oncoming traffic. prediction: Vehicles ahead will continue moving forward through the green light. Oncoming traffic will maintain their lanes. The green light may change soon, requiring slowing or stopping.
